about_the_game:
Rule a small fantasy kingdom and conquer your rivals as you build up your cities and armies on the world map and command your troops on the battlefield

Small Kingdoms is a streamlined grand strategy and real-time strategy game with procedurally generated campaigns

Choose various options for the campaign including the number of kingdoms and cities, and a campaign map will be generated with a world consisting of several small islands, making each play through unique

Choose to play as one of several kingdoms that each has their own set of islands and cities. The kingdoms all have similar unit types, but each has their own unique flavour, with strengths and weaknesses for you to use strategically

Build up your cities by constructing buildings, gathering resources and training units for your garrison from the world map. Will your cities be economic powerhouses producing loads of resources? Or will they be military training camps designed to get a variety of new units into your armies?

Train units for your armies on the world map, then send them into battle and command them on the battlefield to achieve victory in siege and field combat. Will you build a balanced army capable of engaging in close quarters or at a distance? Or will you focus on ranged units to strike down the enemy from afar?
